mapper.insert: INSERT INTO security_user(id, name, password, phone, email, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) VALUES (#{securityUser.id}, #{securityUser.name}, #{securityUser.password}, #{securityUser.phone}, #{securityUser.email}, #{securityUser.createTime}, #{securityUser.createBy}, #{securityUser.updateTime}, #{securityUser.updateBy})
